subject: Travel?  Military?  Save cellular airtime and listen to your voicemail
body:
Have you ever wished you would have saved that important 
                          voicemail? Would you like to share your voicemails with 
                          family, friends or coworkers? With GotVoice, you can, 
                          for FREE!

What 
                        is GotVoice?

GotVoice 
                        retrieves voice messages from your existing home and cellular 
                        phones and delivers them directly to your Email inbox 
                        with a simple click of a button. 
                        What 
                          can I do with GotVoice?


Listen to your voice messages on your PC. 
                          Retrieve new and saved voice messages from your 
                            phones. 
                          Manage your voicemails just like email - listen 
                            to, forward, and save messages. 
                          Listen to your voicemail anywhere in the world - 
                            perfect for travelers or overseas military 
                          Uses your existing phone numbers 
                          Save cellular airtime! 








 






 
Enjoy the convenience and flexibility of email 
                              with your voicemail! 
 






Click 
                                Here to sign up now!














  Works with these carriers and more:





 

We hope you find these communications valuable. If you prefer to no longer receive promotional offers or research e-mails from GotVoice, click here to unsubscribe.

 To view our privacy policy, click here.
